rooms.description: Spacious living area with a Bohemian theme featuring vibrant textiles and eclectic decor. Open plan connecting to the balcony.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the kitchen area, styled with vintage Bohemian elements.
Fully functional modern kitchen integrated with a small pantry and storage areas. Bohemian accents in cabinetry.
Connected to the living room for outdoor relaxation.

openings.description: Main entrance with a welcoming archway.
